"None of us have gone near his room sinc: "But Ilma must have been going in there."
"Did you inherit this lodge from your grandfather?"
"Yeah. There's barely anyone around here in Kvaris anymore, so it was really only a formality."
"But we're going to restore this region. Just like Gramps always dreamed of."
"Your grandfather had been investigating Lost Central in great detail. He even had information about the internal structures..."
"...Here, in this location. There's a service entrance that connects to Lost Central."
"Should be right outside of Mistra Forest."
"But I don't remember there being any kind of road around that area..."
"I believe it may be hidden, unrecognizable at a glance."
"Then let's get going and find him!"
"I suppose it's inevitable. It won't be an easy road ahead..."
"...But I'll protect each and every one of you! Let's go!"
